name: Cold Light (Oneiromancer) (Oneiromancer)
description:
Cold Light is a puzzle game where you, as an AI overseeing an underground lab, need to guide a little girl through a dark and empty dungeon to the exit. But you don't directly control the character. Instead, you need to use a sequence of light signals to tell your character what to do.

This game was originally made as an entry for Extra Credits Game Jam 6. Then I took some time to polish it and expand into a full game.

Stay tuned for mobile release.
